text: Multimedia is communication that uses more than one type of information content (e.g. text, audio, graphics, animation, video) to inform or entertain the audience (user). Multimedia also means the use of electronic media to store and experience multimedia content. Multimedia means that computer info can be represented through audio, graphics, image, video and animation in addition to traditional media (text and graphics). Multimedia is a mix of different forms: == References, Sources, and Notes == Multimedia Making it Work, by Tay Vaughan, Published by Osborne McGraw Hill 1993 ==Other websites== * Machizo Multimedia Communication * Common Language Project Category:Communication
title: Multimedia
